mapper.select: SELECT m.quantity, m.product_id, m.image, m.model, m.price, CASE WHEN m.special!=-1 AND m.special!=0 THEN m.special * m.quantity ELSE m.sub_totals END AS sub_totals, m.stock_status_id, m.minimum, m.stock_status_name, m.product_quantity, m.name, m.description, CASE WHEN m.special!=-1 AND m.special!=0 THEN m.special ELSE '' END AS special FROM ( SELECT c.quantity, p.product_id, p.image, p.model, p.price, (p.price * c.quantity) AS sub_totals, p.stock_status_id, p.minimum, (SELECT ss.name FROM dr_stock_status ss WHERE ss.stock_status_id = p.stock_status_id AND ss.language_id=#{language_id}) AS stock_status_name, IFNULL((SELECT pq.quantity FROM product_quantity pq WHERE pq.model = p.model),0) AS product_quantity, pd.name, pd.description, IFNULL((SELECT ps.price FROM my_product_special ps WHERE ps.product_id = p.product_id AND ps.customer_group_id IN('0',#{customer_group_id}) AND ((ps.date_start = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_start < NOW()) AND (ps.date_end = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_end > NOW())) ORDER BY ps.priority ASC, ps.price ASC LIMIT 1),-1) AS special FROM my_cart c, my_product p LEFT JOIN my_product_description pd ON (p.product_id = pd.product_id) WHERE c.product_id = p.product_id AND c.customer_id = #{customer_id} AND pd.language_id = 1 ) m

SELECT m.code, m.title, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN m.special!=-1 AND m.special!=0 THEN m.special * m.quantity ELSE m.value END),0) AS value FROM ( SELECT 'sub_total' AS code, '소계' AS title, c.quantity, (p.price * c.quantity) AS value, IFNULL((SELECT ps.price FROM my_product_special ps WHERE ps.product_id = p.product_id AND ps.customer_group_id IN('0',#{customer_group_id}) AND ((ps.date_start = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_start < NOW()) AND (ps.date_end = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_end > NOW())) ORDER BY ps.priority ASC, ps.price ASC LIMIT 1),-1) AS special FROM my_cart c, my_product p WHERE c.product_id = p.product_id AND c.customer_id = #{customer_id} ) m

SELECT m.code, m.title, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN m.special!=-1 AND m.special!=0 THEN m.special * m.quantity ELSE m.value END),0) AS value, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN m.special!=-1 AND m.special!=0 THEN m.special * m.quantity ELSE m.sum_price END),0) AS sum_price, IFNULL(SUM(m.sum_quantity),0) AS sum_quantity FROM ( SELECT 'total' AS code, '총합계' AS title, c.quantity, (p.price * c.quantity) AS value, CASE WHEN p.mpn='21' THEN p.price * c.quantity ELSE 0 END AS sum_price, CASE WHEN p.mpn='21' THEN c.quantity ELSE 0 END AS sum_quantity, IFNULL((SELECT ps.price FROM my_product_special ps WHERE ps.product_id = p.product_id AND ps.customer_group_id IN('0',#{customer_group_id}) AND ((ps.date_start = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_start < NOW()) AND (ps.date_end = '0000-00-00' OR ps.date_end > NOW())) ORDER BY ps.priority ASC, ps.price ASC LIMIT 1),-1) AS special FROM my_cart c, my_product p WHERE c.product_id = p.product_id AND c.customer_id = #{customer_id} ) m
SELECT * FROM my_order_total WHERE order_id = #{order_id} ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(p.weight * c.quantity),0) AS weight FROM my_cart c, my_product p WHERE c.product_id = p.product_id AND c.customer_id = #{customer_id}
